content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest price possible. I am willing to pay 300 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my expectations. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Are you open to paying a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 350 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 350 Euros is still below my asking price. This apartment is in high demand due to its prime location and modern amenities. I'm looking for a rent that reflects its value. Are you willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. I am willing to pay 400 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price, and I am a dependable and responsible tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, but I'm sorry to say that 400 Euros is still not enough for this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the quality and convenience of this property and is willing to pay a fair market price. Are you open to increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 450 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price, and I am a dependable and responsible tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer is getting closer to my expectations, but I'm sorry to say that 450 Euros is still not quite there. This apartment is in a very competitive market, and I've had other potential tenants express interest. Are you willing to go higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price, and I am a dependable and responsible tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 500 Euros per month is more in line with the value of this apartment. However, I've had another potential tenant offer 550 Euros. Are you willing to match or exceed that offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I am willing to pay 550 Euros per month. I believe it is a fair price, and I am a dependable and responsible tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent, Farhad! Your offer of 550 Euros per month is very close to my asking price. I'm sure we can work out the details if you're willing to pay that amount. Would you like to proceed with the lease at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful, Farhad! I'm glad to have you as a tenant. Let's proceed with the lease at 550 Euros per month. You'll receive all the necessary documents soon. Thank you for choosing my apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
